annotations.description: Let's hope the managers of both teams will be able to spark the players into life in the next matches. Up to this point the game today has lacked any interesting or exciting moments. The away side dominated the game. The home team really focused on a well organized defence, while the away team played possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Mark Clattenburg is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
James Milner (Liverpool) sends a long ball in, but Fraser Forster comfortably gathers the ball.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Milner (Liverpool) swings in the corner, but the goalkeeper does a brilliant job to intercept the effort.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Sadio Mane walks off the pitch and Divock Origi (Liverpool) comes on as a substitute.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 4 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Sadio Mane (Liverpool) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. The ball goes out of play and Liverpool have been awarded a corner kick.
James Milner (Liverpool) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) collects a pass on the edge of the box and unleashes a shot which is brilliantly blocked by a defender.

A through ball from Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) fails to reach Sadio Mane as one of the defending players reacts brilliantly to intercept the effort. If the pass had been produced a little bit earlier, Sadio Mane could have got into a promising position.
A neat pass is well received by Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool), who is lurking on the edge of the box and strikes the ball on goal. The goalkeeper makes a decent save to block his shot.
Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) tries to find Sadio Mane, but he puts too much power on the pass.
James Milner (Liverpool) attempts to put the ball in from a rebound with his long range shot, but it isn't accurate enough and the ball goes wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.

Fraser Forster pulls off a great save to deny Roberto Firmino (Liverpool), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot to the right side of the goal. Liverpool force their opponents to concede a corner.
Daniel Sturridge swings the cross over. Nathaniel Clyne (Liverpool) gets his head to it but it goes just wide of the left post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Pierre Emile Hojbjerg is going off and Claude Puel gives the last tactical orders to Harrison Reed (Southampton).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: That's the end of the game for Emre Can, who is replaced by Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) picked up a yellow card for saying too much to the referee.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.
James Milner (Liverpool) sprays a pass out to Roberto Firmino, but he can't beat his man inside the box. Liverpool get a corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here's the change. Charlie Austin leaves the pitch and Jay Rodriguez (Southampton) comes on as a substitute.
Liverpool control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) wastes a good opportunity as his pass into the box is blocked by the defence. The ball is out of play and Liverpool manage to earn a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: James Milner (Liverpool) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.

James Milner (Liverpool) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack. Liverpool have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here comes a substitution. Shane Long (Southampton) is brought on as a substitute for Sofiane Boufal.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) shoots after receiving a good pass. His effort from the edge of the box goes just wide of the left post.
Emre Can (Liverpool) receives a fine low pass and attempts to send the ball past the goalkeeper, but his shot goes wide of the goal.
James Milner (Liverpool) whips the ball in from the long range free kick, but the first man gets it clear.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alves Cedric (Southampton) receives a yellow card for a nasty tackle.
Charlie Austin (Southampton) receives a fine low pass and attempts to send the ball past the goalkeeper, but his shot goes wide of the goal.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner comes to nothing as Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) sends it out of play.

Joel Matip (Liverpool) receives the ball inside the box from the resulting free kick, but fails to score as his shot is blocked by one of the defenders. The ball is out of play. A goal scoring opportunity from a corner for Liverpool.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) takes a direct free kick.
Southampton concede a free kick after one of their players holds onto an opposition player. Liverpool earn a free kick.
The game is interrupted as Sadio Mane (Liverpool) is flagged offside.
The Liverpool players are exchanging some short passes to try and open up the opposition’s defence and hit them swiftly on the break.
Jose Fonte (Southampton) is moving okay again after that injury scare.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Jose Fonte (Southampton) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.
What a big chance! Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) picks up an inch perfect pass inside the box and fires the ball well wide of the left post.

Sadio Mane (Liverpool) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike to the bottom left corner. Fraser Forster pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) meets a cross inside the box, but Fraser Forster wins the battle for the ball and the chance is gone.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The whistle blows and Mark Clattenburg starts the second half.

The opening 45 minutes weren't very eventful and the game could be described as an average one. The visitors are mostly controlling the match and making it tough for the home side to keep up. The home team's main priority is a flawless defence, while the away side's style is slow build up play.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.
An accurate pass to the edge of the box is well taken by Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool), whose instinctive shot towards goal flashes inches wide of the left post.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 1 min. of added time.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) attempts to set up his teammate with a scoring opportunity by chipping in a fine pass from the edge of the box, but one of the defenders intercepts his effort.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) works the corner short.

Sadio Mane (Liverpool) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Sadio Mane (Liverpool) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar. The ball goes out of play. Liverpool are awarded a corner kick.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) is flagged for offside.
Sadio Mane (Liverpool) sends a chip pass into the box, but Fraser Forster is quickest to intercept the ball.
Some great controlled play and passing from Liverpool. They are increasing their possession of the ball and trying to open up the opposition's defence to hit them swiftly on the break.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) receives a pass and decides to smash the ball from long range. His poor effort sails well wide of the left post.
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle as Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) used excessive force in the tackle during an attack.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.

Sadio Mane (Liverpool) has a good chance to score with a mid range attempt after collecting a pass. He aims for the top right corner, but he can't generate enough power to trouble Fraser Forster. It will be a corner kick for Liverpool.
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle for a foul.
Sadio Mane (Liverpool) is unable to control an accurate defence splitting pass properly and one of the defending players reacts well to rob him of the ball.
Jose Fonte (Southampton) takes a short free kick.
A clumsy foul by James Milner (Liverpool) and Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle. It's a free kick to Southampton in a dangerous position.
Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
The linesman raises his flag. Charlie Austin (Southampton) is adjudged offside.
Sadio Mane (Liverpool) does his best to latch onto a cross into the box, but he can't get to the ball.
A player from Liverpool commits an attacking foul. The referee blows his whistle.

Alves Cedric (Southampton) holds his head in his hands after wasting a promising chance. He latches onto a rebound, creates some space for himself and fires the ball from the edge of the box well wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Liverpool.
One of the defenders reacts at the last minute to brilliantly block a pass from Nathaniel Clyne (Liverpool).
Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) and Roberto Firmino attempt to exchange short two yard passes, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) commits a foul and Mark Clattenburg immediately signals a free kick. Southampton win a free kick and will be able to apply some pressure on the opposition goal.
Liverpool are bossing possession at the moment by exchanging some precise passes from player to player.
Nathan Redmond (Southampton) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Steven Davis (Southampton) takes the corner and sends it into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and makes a good clearance.

Ryan Bertrand (Southampton) gets to the rebound just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by one of the defending players. The ball goes out for a corner. Southampton can continue in their attacking effort.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half of this match is about to start.
The players are on the pitch and Southampton will have the kick off.
Mark Clattenburg will officiate today.
